item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Akismet Review
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Akismet Review
item.description: [...] Since installing the Akismet plugin for WordPress just over one month ago it has processed caught more than 1600 pieces of spam. Most of these are sent via trackback/pingback, although there are those still submitting comment spam. That brings the daily average to more than 50. But really those aren’t the most important numbers to look at. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Since installing the Akismet plugin for WordPress just over one month ago it has processed caught more than 1600 pieces of spam. Most of these are sent via trackback/pingback, although there are those still submitting comment spam. That brings the daily average to more than 50. But really those aren’t the most important numbers to look at. […]

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
Hey dude,
If Akismet doesn't work for you, give <a href="http://unknowngenius.com/blog/wordpress/spam-karma/" rel="nofollow">SpamKarma2</a> a try. It's proven to be nearly 100% accurate for me--I've had to eyeball a half dozen moderated comments (all spam), with one false positive (which was easily rescued). So far, no spam has slipped through.
item.content:encoded:
Hey dude,

If Akismet doesn’t work for you, give SpamKarma2 a try. It’s proven to be nearly 100% accurate for me–I’ve had to eyeball a half dozen moderated comments (all spam), with one false positive (which was easily rescued). So far, no spam has slipped through.

item.description: Curious to see how it works for you.
